original: @380b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @380b rgya gar skad du /

original: a'arya lo ha dunda n'am dh'a ra n'i /
analyzed: a'arya lo ha dunda n'am dh'a ra n'i /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs /

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha na rgyu zhing aa mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas aa mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha na rgyu zhing aa mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas aa mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed One was wandering in the land of Magadha and arrived at the Mango Grove. He stayed in the cave of the Lord of the Mountain of the Body in the Mango Grove.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived, he bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One and sat to one side.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Having sat to one side, Śakra, Lord of the Gods, said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: lha ma yin rnams dang / mi rnams ni /
analyzed: lha ma yin rnams dang / mi rnams ni /

original: bstan pa la gnod par bgyid pa ste /
analyzed: bstan pa la gnod par bgyid pa ste /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: lha ma yin dang / 'khor du mi gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na /
analyzed: lha ma yin dang / 'khor du mi gtogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na /
translated: if the asuras and enemies who are not included in the retinue are long-term adversaries who harm the teachings,

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mi 'dul na /
translated: then, Bhagavān, if they cannot be subdued peacefully,

original: bdag la drag pos 'dul ba'i chos bstan du gsol /🔽theg pa'i chos dgra srung du gsol; de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bdag la drag pos 'dul ba'i chos bstan du gsol / theg pa'i chos dgra srung du gsol; de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: please teach the Dharma that will subdue them through wrath.🔽Please protect the Dharma enemies of the vehicles.”

original: lha'i dbang po /🔽khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin ba'i @381a *//
analyzed: lha'i dbang po / khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin ba'i @381a *//
translated: When this was said, the Bhagavān said to Śakra, lord of the gods, “Lord of the gods,🔽you should give everyone the dhāraṇī of the iron hook

original: lcags mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa /
analyzed: lcags mchu'i gzungs ma rungs pa 'joms pa /

original: don thams cad byed pa /
analyzed: don thams cad byed pa /

original: dam ba'i chos srung ba /
analyzed: dam ba'i chos srung ba /

original: 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /

original: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /
analyzed: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa /

original: dug thams cad 'jil ba /
analyzed: dug thams cad 'jil ba /

original: mtshon thams cad rengs bar byed ba /
analyzed: mtshon thams cad rengs bar byed ba /

original: theg ba'i chos dgra srung pa /
analyzed: theg ba'i chos dgra srung pa /
translated: Protector of the Dharma enemies of the vehicles,

original: rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa /
analyzed: rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi thams cad rengs par byed pa /
translated: paralyzer of all legless, two-legged, and four-legged beings,

original: rkang gnyis thams cad skrag tu 'jug pa /
analyzed: rkang gnyis thams cad skrag tu 'jug pa /

original: dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa /🔽lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang /🔽nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang /
analyzed: dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dren gyi gdon dang /
translated: destroyer of all enemies,🔽destroyer of the asuras, garuḍas, piśācas, piśācīs, unmādas, apasmāras, rākṣasas, bhūtas, vetālas, bird grahas, and pūtanas,

original: ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa /
analyzed: ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa /
translated: destroyer of the grahas of the nakṣatras, the grahas of the planets, the grahas of the sun, the grahas of the moon, the grahas of the stars, the grahas of the planets, the grahas of the gods, the grahas of the nāgas, the grahas of the yakṣas, the grahas of the gandharvas, the grahas of the kinnaras, the grahas of the mātṛs, and the grahas of the mātṛs,

original: zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed ba /
analyzed: zas kyi rigs mi mthun pa za ba phung bar byed ba /
translated: destroyer of those who eat incompatible foods,

original: rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa /
analyzed: rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa phung bar byed pa /
translated: all fevers,🔽those born of wind, bile, phlegm, and their combination,🔽and those that afflict beings with violent behavior.

original: 'thab pa dang / rtsod ba dang / 'tshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs @381b nam mkha' lding drag po'i gzungs 'di zungs shig /
analyzed: 'thab pa dang / rtsod ba dang / 'tshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs @381b nam mkha' lding drag po'i gzungs 'di zungs shig /
translated: It pacifies all quarrels, disputes, and conflicts.

original: bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa /
analyzed: bstan pa la gnod pa skrag par byed pa /
translated: It terrifies those who harm the teachings.

original: char drag po dang / ser ba drag bo 'bebs par byed pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: char drag po dang / ser ba drag bo 'bebs par byed pa'i gzungs brjod par bya'o //
translated: It causes heavy rains and hail to fall.🔽This is the spell of the powerful garuḍa with an iron beak.🔽You should recite it.

analyzed: tadya th'a / ae he me te /

analyzed: sarba dushpra pra dusht'an /

original: n'a sha ya sarba aa bha ya pra de h'um phat/
analyzed: n'a sha ya sarba aa bha ya pra de h'um phat/

original: sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun tu g-yos /🔽kun tu rab tu g-yos /
analyzed: sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun tu g-yos / kun tu rab tu g-yos /
translated: By merely reciting this mantra, all the ten directions will shake,🔽tremble,

original: 'gul / rab tu 'gul lo //
analyzed: 'gul / rab tu 'gul lo //

original: gnod pa thams cad kha bub tu brgyal lo //
analyzed: gnod pa thams cad kha bub tu brgyal lo //
translated: All harm will be turned away and subdued.

original: ske tshe dang / nyungs nag tu bsres la chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri bo la gtor ro //
analyzed: ske tshe dang / nyungs nag tu bsres la chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / ri bo la gtor ro //
translated: Mix black mustard seeds and white mustard seeds, and cast them into rivers, oceans, and mountains.

original: de phyin chad char 'bebs par byed do //🔽yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu mig dang / rdzing bu /
analyzed: de phyin chad char 'bebs par byed do // yang chu bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu mig dang / rdzing bu /
translated: From then on, rain will fall.🔽Moreover, cast them into rivers, oceans, springs, ponds,

original: lu ma / 'bab chu gnyan rgur bu ram /🔽sbrang / shing mngar /
analyzed: lu ma / 'bab chu gnyan rgur bu ram / sbrang / shing mngar /
translated: pools, waterfalls, and dangerous places.🔽Mix them with honey, molasses,🔽sugar cane,

original: sha ka ra /
analyzed: sha ka ra /

original: klu sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro //
analyzed: klu sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro //
translated: Mix various nāga medicines with milk and make an offering.

original: de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir ser ba chen po 'bebs so //
translated: Therefore, a great hail will fall.

original: yid zlos bgyis te sprin la bltas la lha phyag bya zhing bzlas na /
analyzed: yid zlos bgyis te sprin la bltas la lha phyag bya zhing bzlas na /
translated: If one recites mentally and looks at the clouds, makes obeisance to the gods, and recites,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro //🔽shes rab can gyis 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs @382a *//
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i ser ba chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro // shes rab can gyis 'phags pa lcags kyi mchu'i gzungs @382a *//
translated: a great hail will fall as desired.🔽The wise should uphold

original: 'di zungs shig /
analyzed: 'di zungs shig /
translated: this dhāraṇī of Noble Iron-Beak.🔽Uphold it,

original: chongs shig / rjod cig /
analyzed: chongs shig / rjod cig /

original: gzhan la ma spel cig /
analyzed: gzhan la ma spel cig /
translated: but do not spread it to others.🔽Conceal it,

original: sbos shig / thun mong du min no //
analyzed: sbos shig / thun mong du min no //

original: rgya mtsho'i chu rngo bzhin mi mngon par sbos shig /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i chu rngo bzhin mi mngon par sbos shig /
translated: Conceal it as if it were the water of the ocean.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i drag po'i gzungs 'thab pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i drag po'i gzungs 'thab pa'am /

original: rtsod pa'am / 'gyed pa'am /
analyzed: rtsod pa'am / 'gyed pa'am /

original: gang du 'gro yang rung ste /
analyzed: gang du 'gro yang rung ste /

original: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be victorious in all cases.

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la byang bu gzugs so //🔽sngags pa rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la byang bu gzugs so // sngags pa rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Attach a label to the top of a victory banner.🔽Any mantra practitioner, son of good family,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gis yid rtse gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gis yid rtse gcig tu bya'o //
translated: or daughter of good family should do this with a single-pointed mind.

original: dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma'am /

original: dge bsnyen pha'am /
analyzed: dge bsnyen pha'am /
translated: male and female lay followers,🔽in order to avert harm to the teachings.

original: dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung ba bstan pa la gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yid la zungs shig /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung ba bstan pa la gnod pa bzlog pa'i phyir yid la zungs shig /

original: chongs shig / de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: chongs shig / de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken thus, Śakra, Lord of the Gods, together with the world of gods, asuras, and gandharvas, rejoiced and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī of Iron Teeth is complete.
